description: Archipel Configuration. You must configure folowing parameters to start the Archipel Chain and also a Polkadot node. [README](https://github.com/luguslabs/archipel#archipel)

config_file_password.title: Archipel Zip Config File Password
config_file_password.description: Optional password for the Archipel Zip Config File

node_id.title: NODE ID
node_id.description: Archipel Config Node choice. Must be 1 or 2 or 3
